item.description:
We've been talking about this for a while so please join us at MCormick & Schmick's in Providence for the first RI Atheist Society Happy Hour!

McCormick & Schmick's is rumored to have the best happy hour in the state! There are appetizers starting at $1.95 and burgers for $2.95. You'll find specifics of the menu at: http://www.mccormicka.... Just follow the link for the Providence restaurant.

Hope to see everyone there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the bar area of the restaurant.
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society Happy Hour
